Summary: A white light about 1000-1500 ft over the water.
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was all white moving very fast and it made a 90* turn, and then out over the sea and out of site in about 10-20sec like someone turned off the light. There was one other person with me at the time, but she stated she would not talk too know one about, when I told her we needed to report it. I saw the far in her face and she was very upset after this and asked me not to tell other and if I did, not to tell her name to no one.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Galveston
There were no other sightings in Galveston on or around January 30th 1998
